pst:content.p: This website is built on PSP: PHP Server Pages, an XML Publishing Framework leveraging PHP, XML, XSLT, Javascript, XHTML, and CSS. It is specifically designed to be able to be hosted on standard php hosting environments.

It's predecessor, XSP (XML Server Pages), which has an implementation in Java aswell as C++, is based on server-side code generation, compilation and execution. This PHP version differs in that no code is generated, thereby separating code from XML transformations. Instead, PHP module functionality is exposed to XSL.
